_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The effects of the arising and cessation: The arising of the six elements is the arising of suffering, the continuation of diseases, and the manifestation of old age and death.
The cessation of the six elements is the cessation of suffering, the settling of diseases, and the ending of old age and death.
